data: The convent of the Black Penitents was a very different building indeed, and a very different establishment altogether from that which the imagination of the reader may have raised up from the images furnished by dark and mysterious tales of Italian superstition.
Henry of Guise; or, The States of Blois
G. P. R. (George Payne Rainsford) James
